document.full_text: sean penn plays a catatonic goth rocker in "this must be the place," a strange tale that follows retired pop star cheyenne from a life of luxury in ireland to a hunt for a world war two nazi camp guard in the united states.
document.title: sean penn plays catatonic goth rocker in cannes
